name: Sean_Ladoux
text:
Sean Ladoux
Sean Ladoux was a competitor in the 1955 Packard Timber Games.
During the Trunk Chop, Ladoux set a new record by chopping through a six and a half foot trunk in thirty-seven minutes, severing his right toe in the process. He had the toe bronzed and displayed at the County Museum, but it was lost in the 1980s.
